title: Got2b Ultra Glued Invincible Styling Gel, 6-Ounce
description: This gel’s hold is no joke!  So put it down and slowly back away if you’re not up for the strongest gel hold ever!  This non-sticky, no-flake formula is powered by a high-tech styling agent – we call it Alpha XTR.  Call it what you want, it lets you take your hair to new heights.  Or do your own thing and cement your individual style.  And when the party comes to an end, easily un-glue with a little shampoo.  Go ahead – style away!

title: Bosley Revive Starter Pack for Visibly Thinning / Color-Treated Hair 3pc
description:
# (1) 5.1 oz Bosley Revive Nourishing Shampoo for Color Treated Hair - Maintain thicker and fuller hair with Bosley Revive Shampoo for Color Treated Hair. This gentle shampoo cleanses the scalp of DHT and environmental residue that can contribute to hair loss, creating an optimal scalp environment for healthier, thicker-looking hair. Bosley Revive Nourishing Shampoo is designed to address the specific needs of people with thinning hair and has been proven in clinical studies to be an effective solution to the problem of weak and thinning hair. Infused with Bosley's unique ingredient blend, Bosley Revive Nourishing Shampoo will leave hair looking fuller, thicker and more resilient.

# (1) 5.1 oz Bosley Revive Volumizing Conditioner for Color Treated Hair - Bosley Revive Volumizing Conditioner for Color Treated Hair is a conditioner that moisturizes and energizes the scalp. This conditioner is formulated with vitamins that provide moisturizing nourishment to the scalp and hair. Bosley Revive Conditioner stimulates the scalp, infuses moisture, relieves dryness, and reduces flaking and itching. It strengthens and nourishes hair shaft and improves hair texture. Bosley Revive Volumizing Conditioner gives you instant volume and creates thicker, fuller, flexible hair.

# (1) 3.4 oz Bosley Revive Volumizing Treatment for Color Treated Hair - is used daily to improve the appearance of thinning hair. It nourishes the follicle for thicker, fuller hair and stimulates vital blood circulation to the scalp. Bosley Revive Volumizing Treatment is used to accelerate scalp respiration, nourish hair follicles, and remove DHT and environmental residue buildup from the scalp, resulting in healthier, thicker looking hair.

title: I*Light Organic Advanced Brightening & Line Smoothing Eye Treatment, 0.15oz
description:
I*Light is the only eye treatment you will ever need and it will become your #1 favorite product. It offers quadruple action. Unique blend of natural oils and plant extracts instantly smooth out fine lines and wrinkles, de-congests and lightens the eye area, instantly minimizing visible under eye shadowing and puffiness. After 4 weeks it visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness.

Calming and restorative, rich in antioxidants provided by a cocktail of superberries like Goji, Raspberry, Pomegranate, Cranberry and Blueberry and rich in Vitamin C, I*Light fights skin damage and cellular oxidation that causes premature aging, by excessive free radical activity. Combination of Kojic Acid and Milk Thistle repair sun damage and sun spots, hence improve and brighten up overall eye area, while  Caffeine, Horse Chestnut, Arnica, and Ginkgo Biloba improve blood circulation acting as decongestants, reducing water retention, shadows and puffiness. Adding astringent properties, they cause constriction of blood vessels, anti-inflammatory, as well as circulation boosting properties. Reishi and Caviar rich in vitamins, CoQ10 and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid help to fight aging, supporting natural skin function the best way possible, improving firmness, elasticity and keeping your eyes looking fresh, bright and forever beautiful.

title: Frizz Ease Heat Defeat Protective Styling Spray By JOHN FRIEDA, 6 Ounce
description: Works with heat tools. Conditions and strengthens for up to 24 hours. ThermaGuard complex protects against damage. Defend straight styles to the end. This protective spray straightens strands for up to 24 hours. This helps block humidity and rehydrates.
